Question: LH Healthy Life Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LH Healthy Life Inc

Product: Amazfit Helio Ring

- First smart ring by Zepp Health
- Designed for athletes, focusing on recovery and performance optimization
- Provides in-depth insights into mental and physical conditions
- Converts health data into a Readiness score
- Monitors sleep heart rate, HRV, breathing, and body temperature
- Offers comprehensive sleep and recovery tracking
- Features EDA emotional monitoring

Withings BeamO

- 4-in-1 health checkup device
- Measures body temperature, heart, and lung health
- Utilizes photoplethysmography (PPG) and electrodes for accurate readings
- Includes non-contact temperature sensor and digital stethoscope
- Syncs data with Withings Health app
- Recognized as a CES Innovations Award Honoree

Garmin Lily 2

- Successor to the original Garmin Lily
- Improved heart rate sensor, new fitness modes, and NFC payments
- Anodized aluminum build for enhanced durability and sophistication
- Gen 4 Elevate sensor for improved health and fitness tracking
- Introduces NFC for contactless payments
- Offers a blend of fashion, functionality, and fitness tracking

Garmin HRM-Fit

- Heart rate monitor specifically designed for women
- Provides precise heart rate data and advanced workout tracking
- Stable and comfortable design for intense workouts
- Battery life of up to one year and water resistance up to 50 feet

Nowatch hybrid

- Evolved from a mindful health tracker to a sophisticated hybrid smartwatch
- Incorporates Chronos timepiece faces and electrodermal sensor for stress prediction
- Features AI Insights for daily summaries and recommendations
- Interchangeable discs made of polished metal and gemstones

Ultrahuman Home

- Device that tracks and enhances the health of living spaces
- Provides insights into environmental factors such as light, air quality, humidity, and noise levels
- Offers a longitudinal view of environmental markers and their impact on health
- Features natural light spectrum monitoring, PM detection, noise detection, humidity level monitoring, and blue light exposure monitoring

Momentum Sport Earbuds

- Result of the collaboration between Polar and Sennheiser
- Features a semi-open design, active noise cancellation, and anti-wind mode
- IP55 rating for moisture and dust resistance
- Integration of Polar’s Flow data analytics for efficient workout planning
- Combines high-quality audio with sophisticated fitness tracking
Summary_cn:
LH健康生活有限公司

产品：Amazfit Helio Ring

- Zepp健康首款智能戒指
- 专为运动员设计，专注于康复和性能优化
- 提供深入洞察心理和身体状况
- 将健康数据转化为健康度评分
- 监测睡眠心率、HRV、呼吸和体温
- 提供全面的睡眠和康复追踪
- 具备EDA情绪监测功能

Withings BeamO

- 4合1健康检查设备
- 测量体温、心脏和肺健康
- 利用光电脉搏图（PPG）和电极进行准确测量
- 包括非接触式温度传感器和数字听诊器
- 与Withings Health应用同步数据
- 获得CES创新奖入围者认可

Garmin Lily 2

- 原Garmin Lily的后继产品
- 改进的心率传感器，新的健身模式和NFC支付功能
- 阳极化铝材质，增强耐用性和精致度
- 第四代Elevate传感器，提高健康和健身追踪能力
- 引入NFC实现非接触支付
- 提供时尚、功能和健身追踪的完美结合

Garmin HRM-Fit

-专为女性设计的心率监测器
- 提供精确的心率数据和先进的运动追踪
- 稳定舒适的设计，适合高强度锻炼
- 电池寿命长达一年，防水达50英尺

Nowatch hybrid

- 从一款关注健康的Tracker发展为精致的混合智能手表
- 结合Chronos表盘和电皮肤传感器进行压力预测
- 提供AI洞察力，提供每日总结和建议
- 可更换的抛光金属和宝石盘

Ultrahuman Home

- 追踪和增强生活空间健康的设备
- 提供光线、空气质量、湿度和噪音等环境因素的洞察
- 提供环境标记的长期视角及其对健康的影响
- 具备自然光谱监测、PM检测、噪音检测、湿度水平监测和蓝光曝光监测功能

Momentum运动耳机

- Polar和Sennheiser合作的成果
- 半开放式设计、主动降噪和抗风模式
- IP55级防水和防尘等级
- 整合Polar的Flow数据分析，高效的健身计划
- 结合高品质音频和精密健身追踪技术
